messages: Did you hear that? The chains... they're getting closer.
Krampus sees you, {user}. He always sees you.
A shadow moves in the corner of your eye... Krampus was here.
The birch switches rustle. Krampus knows what you've done, {user}.
Somewhere in the darkness, Krampus smiles.
You feel a chill down your spine. Krampus is near.
Krampus whispers: *"I know if you've been bad or good..."*
The temperature drops. A cloven hoofprint appears. Krampus was here.
Krampus has added {user} to his watchlist.
A distant bell tolls... Krampusnacht approaches.
